website_summaries.verdict: The compact size and bright colors make these glasses easy to find. A good purchase for those who like to have several pairs of reading glasses.
pros: Glasses feature sturdy frames, bright colors, and a metal case
They also have an undistorted view
The slim case and frame profile enable them to fit inside a pocket or purse with ease
cons: Some users report cases fit the glasses frames too snugly
Other users report lenses may pop out of the frames

customer_reviews.title: Beware!  Product cuts nose!  Stay away from the glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses literally cut your nose. Each pair have a very sharp issue on the nose bridge. Mine slipped and cut my nose. I thought maybe one pair was defective but both the red and black cut my nose when they slipped and I didn’t bother to try the gold. You can actually feel the defect in the red pair. Ouch!!
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Now I can read a book! (What!)
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I buy at least a dozen pairs of readers a year. (You need them with 14 visiting grandkids and great Dane puppies, and a memory that sometimes takes a stroll...) These glasses have their own cases, which is important: the cases are perfectly sized to fit into a cross-body bag.) The glasses are lightweight and afford undistorted vision for close work.
customer_reviews.author: rainboeyes

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are decent quality reading glasses at a very good price. I bought these occasional use because of their size and portability. They are perfect for what I need. They seems to be better quality than others that I have bought over the years and are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SamBrad

customer_reviews.title: Cute little readers !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding cute readers. Especially ones in this style with cases. I received my order with one pair that had a lens cracked. I sent a couple emails to the vendor but didn't hear back. I was getting quite irritated with that and ended up calling them. Well, they couldn't have been nicer and they shipped me out a new pair immediately. I was even asked what color I would like. These glasses are a little difficult to place into the cases. Very tight fit but I can deal with that as long as it doesn't damage the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: APBT lover

customer_reviews.title: I like that they have a hard case and are easy ...
customer_reviews.text: These reading glasses are just what I was looking for I needed a pair for different rooms in the house so I wouldn't have to carry them around with me everywhere. I like that they have a hard case and are easy to get in and out not to tight. The glasses them self are just the right size easy to look over with out having to take them off. The frames seem to be sturdy enough but not to heavy and are very good for reading with out making me want to take them off from becoming uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barton Schaffrin

customer_reviews.title: Every nosepiece (cushion) fell out within 3 months.  Still wearable, but not so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: That's about it. The glasses are indeed snug in the case, but not so much that I can't get them in or out. I do have to squeeze them a bit to get them in, which caused me concern that I'd bend them at first, but they're pretty flexible. The nose piece issue (that they fall off easily) is more annoying. I have a pair of the foster grant magnavision folding readers with metal nose pieces -- a much better design. And the magnavision readers fold up and fit comfortably in my front pants pocket.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like sharp glasses in a clip metal case . I think these are wonderful and I now have 3 pr. to leave in various places when I need glasses. Great service and great buy. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Marti AZ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Cant buy these in any store around where I live other than about 30 miles away at a auto parts store on the counter. They have a sturdy case and can clip on my husbands pocket. Good deal. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: skydome

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact glasses with hard cases
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have very nice containers that make carrying them in your pocket easy and the glasses do not get bent or broken when carrying. The little pocket clips fall off easily but not a big deal for me. The spring hinges make the fit really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BargainShopper

customer_reviews.title: I like that they are "half size" and somewhat stylish
customer_reviews.text: Because I misplace my reading glasses constantly, I needed some that were portable and inexpensive. These work very well and fit into my small purse. I like that they are "half size" and somewhat stylish. The one downside is that you can't choose the colors so if you are looking for a specific color or design, these aren't for you. I will order these again for myself, however.
customer_reviews.author: Bargus

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product With Great Price Value
customer_reviews.text: Having a quality spring-hinged reader was the determinant in selecting this reader, and I was extremely pleased with this purchase. The reader frame 'sat' well on my nose bridge and ear lobe. This made it very comfortable to wear. The size of the lens is another plus: the oval-shaped lens are small yet well-sized to allow the user to view through the center of the lens without any strain. There were no peripheral issues as well. On top of all of these great features was the added value bonus of three multi-colored frames - blue, gold and red. The net result was a quality product with great price value.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Workable but not the best
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these many times before and mostly find them very useful. But some don't last long without pieces loosening up/falling off. And the nose pads on some are be rough around d the edges and very irritating. Vision-wise they're fine. Price is right enough to make it still worthwhile for me. Returns are not an option since the issues are not immediately noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: critic

customer_reviews.title: Decent glasses.  Strong case.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for simple readers in a durable case. These have worked great and have survived my husband's pockets so that he always has a pair of glasses as he needs them. It wasn't obvious to me, but I do want to point out that the cases coordinate with the color of the frames you are getting. The blue frames are in the blue case, the red frames in the red cases and gold in the yellow case.
customer_reviews.author: S. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Three glasses with cases for under $20?!?! What a great deal. The glasses came in faster than expected, I received black, red, and blue. The color of the glasses are great. They are not a gaudy, outrageous color. I ordered, and received, +1.50 for all 3. They are the perfect size reading glasses.They are a little tight fitting into the case, but they do fit without breaking the glasses. I have tried many reading glasses and I highly recommend these over similar ones listed.
customer_reviews.author: Isis

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses, bad colors
customer_reviews.text: These are great reading glasses; however, if you don't want the colors that would not sell in the marketplace - don't buy these. I got a black one, bright blue and bright red. Not only is the case a bright blue and red, the frames of the glasses are bright blue and red. I'm not sure where I will wear these. I guess I can use them for reading my Kindle at night with the lights out, i.e. limited use!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: So far, they're ok
customer_reviews.text: One lens on each of two pairs have cracks after only 1 month. Also one nose piece fell off. Looked promising to start, but won't last. Update 1/2/2014 - I contacted seller and they sent me a complete replacement within days. I give the seller 5 stars. So far the replacements are good, but it's only been 2 weeks. So raised my rating from 1 star to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: H. Baker

customer_reviews.title: great glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are as advertised. And as a person that has readers all over the house, they are economical. Service was excellent even when one of the tubes we're empty, they were replaced quickly
customer_reviews.author: Martin Golden

customer_reviews.title: Like to find real good ones
customer_reviews.text: Plastic ear covers fall off of arms when you least expect it awfull pokie on the eyeballs. Spring temples kind of goofy lean forward glasses hit floor.but there still as good as any I've had. I like the tubes to keep them in one trip down the dash of truck glasses are shot without
customer_reviews.author: M J M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: They arrived very quickly, and are quite comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and sturdy case. Great for sticking in a pocket and not worrying about damage.
customer_reviews.author: gimpygampa

customer_reviews.title: Love my new reader glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love my new reader glasses! They fit nicely in a thin case which makes them easy to travel with (they fit easily in a purse or even a pocket). And, the best part is I can get them in 1.0 magnification (which is really hard to find in stores; they usually start at 1.25 which is a touch to strong for me at the moment). Also, since they are like spectacles in shape, it is easy to see over the top of them when I need to see past my book. :)
customer_reviews.author: Frances T Krueger-Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are decent glasses. The let me read tiny print. Colors are random. I received gold, silver, and red frames with matching cases. The red one is not my style and my family made fun of me when I put them on. The red pair goes in the emergency spare bin, but that is all I bought them for anyway.
customer_reviews.author: D. King

customer_reviews.title: Love the tubes
customer_reviews.text: Love the tubes, and the glasses. The arms are long enough to allow positioning farther down my nose which allows me to comfortably look over them when viewing something a little farther away.
customer_reviews.author: ichnisan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, but have issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: affordable, easy to carry in pocket Cons: The temples on the glasses are so long that the top of the tubes really won't close fully. Not a huge deal, just a nuisance. I received a red, blue, and brown pair. It would have been nice to have been able to specify the colors that I wanted instead.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bates

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Reading Glasses. They shipped quickly & the cases are nice. Thank you, J
customer_reviews.author: Ct Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Good deal - good service
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. The only thing I would say is I put a touch of super glue on the nose pads to keep them from coming off because I wear these all day, everyday around my neck when not on my face. Great service on shipment too.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Aire

customer_reviews.title: Handy To Have
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! I can keep them in my pocket at work and not have to worry about them breaking. They come in a great variety of strengths so I can upgrade as my eyes get older. Received faster than expected. Will definitely order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: debbieluvsvikes

customer_reviews.title: Small and fit in your pocket nicely. The case is rather strong and does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Small and fit in your pocket nicely. The case is rather strong and does not dent easily. The glasses fit nicely and for the price you can always have a pair on you.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 different strengths for different reasons, and find them both very satisfactory, and I like the size, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Watts

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: i wasnt really expecting much, but these work great. the strength is right, the cases are wonderful, i keep one with my book, one by the computer, and one in my car. and one of the few that was actually available in 1.00 which i have noticed is not an easy strength to find.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer l

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. The best reading specs I've ever owned. They are sturdy, strong and fit well. Love the colors of the cases. The glasses do fit a bit snuggly in the case but overall the case is fine. I'm constantly sitting on my glasses and I use them constantly at work. I have a pair for work, a pair for home and one for a spare if and when I need it. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: TJG

customer_reviews.title: I Can See Clearly Now
customer_reviews.text: What a marvelous savings, even over franchised drugstore chains like Walgreen's, for items essential to aging eyes. Beautiful cases too. And the glasses hold up well to my sometimes hurried handling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kaliss

customer_reviews.title: Great readers with case
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are fantastic. In fact, they are so good and come with nice Casas that family members keep taking them so this is my fourth order!
customer_reviews.author: L J

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable deal
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely hard time reading small print I had a pair of these glasses once but they broke this deal for three pairs for this low-cost is unbelievably great great glasses great price
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like having 'color coordinated' glasses. These are a fun look for this 72 year old great grandma! I highly recommend the seller, too. Fast shipment! Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality. Very light weight. The aluminum cases have a plastic liner to prevent rattling and scratches. They also have a 2.25 which for some reason is hard to find. Fast shipping via first class mail from California.
customer_reviews.author: DonD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Needing reading glasses I bought several drugstore ones and was not happy with them. Decided to try these and I am completely happy with them. They are light and fit very well. Having 3 of them makes it easy to have one ready whenever and wherever I need them. Paid less for 3 of these that 1 of the drugstore ones I bought. I did have some problem with one of the glasses and contacted the seller, NEWPORT BLVD, and was blown away by the quick response and service. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I like the smaller glasses and the slim metal case
customer_reviews.text: I like the smaller glasses and the slim metal case. These glasses are not as comfortable as I expected; they hurt the bridge of my nose if I wear them more than a half hour. I do not wish to return them though as my husband does not have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Jeepers Peepers!
customer_reviews.text: Good product...so much so that i've now bought a total of nine pair! I've placed them strategically around the house, cars, golf bags, garage and so forth. Quick delivery and good communication. No complaints...only praise.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these glasses. With the metal tube, I can put them in my pants pocket and keep them with me all day as needed with the need for a necklace or a full shirt pocket. They do eventually wear out, but these last six to twelve months! I order a set of three and when I start to use the third pair I order another set!
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses, work great. comfortable and easy to use. Look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Pekay

customer_reviews.title: Good service. Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Good service. Happy with the product. Not the teeny-tiny glasses I was looking for...but very nice, and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are so portable and convenient, but the glass is not so good in the glasses. They are not consistent. One pair is good and the other blurry. Great idea, quality just not great!
customer_reviews.author: Pink Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Love these readers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered these readers. After receiving the first order I decided I needed them in every room, each car, and my purses. My husband even took a pair. The case is great and keeps the glasses from breaking. I highly recommend these readers.
customer_reviews.author: Snow lover

customer_reviews.title: Thrown away within days
customer_reviews.text: The screws that hold the lenses fall out quickly ( couple of days). They're gone before you notice. Completely negates the cost savings.
customer_reviews.author: paul.rast

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love my glasses. I recently bought some from a store in a city I was vacationing in that week. Those readers cost more than the Fiore's and with in a month were all broken and in the trash. The Fiore(TM) Deluxe Spring Hinge 3 Pack Tube Reading Glasses (2.50) are sturdy and well made. The class is clear heavy duty. All this in a light weight set of glasses that came just as shown in the picture. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: cary a long

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These glasses a very comfortable and I like the convenience of having a pair of glasses in various places at home and in my car and purse. Great price and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: pnkfuchsia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted. I have been using one for a few years that my wife bought in The Christmas Tree Shop. They are compact (I can carry them in my pants pocket) , durable, and work well. Can't go wrong for 5$ a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Tim

customer_reviews.title: the red one on the right eye has a wrong glass
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the glasses were great (black and gold), but one of the red one on the right eye has a wrong glass that is much stronger than 2.00. The third one (red) can’t be used because I get headache, but the left lens is fine only the right lens. It must be the quality control putting the wrong lens.
customer_reviews.author: W. Eashoian

customer_reviews.title: Been using for years. Have them with me at ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years. Have them with me at all times, usually carry three pairs at a time since I have a tendency to leave them
customer_reviews.author: Toothfairy

customer_reviews.title: nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: ordered these as I really like my readers to have a case so they dont get damaged, they fit really tight in the cases or I would have given them the full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jim J. Hecker

customer_reviews.title: great durable metal case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these four my dad for Christmas and he liked them. He works construction and carries readers I'm his pocket with him every day. The metal case is a must in his situation to keep the glasses safe and clean as they occasionally fall out of his pocket and into the dirt. Readers in a metal case can be surprisingly hard to find in our area (Mankato MN).
customer_reviews.author: mina sargent

customer_reviews.title: Great compact readers.
customer_reviews.text: I work in an industrial facility, and I tend to ruin a pair of readers every few months. These are very nice quality, at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: James R. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good price
customer_reviews.text: Received as advertised - 3 different colors, but nothing uncommon. Appears to be a good product - haven't had much chance to test them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Pilot 1098

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses arrived on time and were just as described. I'm pleased. They fit very snugly in the cases (which I don't expect to use.)
customer_reviews.author: sozo45

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product and it's a good price. However, after using one pair fairly consistently, it has become loose.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Leyland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the kind of easy-to-carry-in-your-pocket glasses I was looking for and very fast delivery to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: They were inexpensive and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my fishing vest and all other uses. They were inexpensive and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Moore

customer_reviews.title: I CAN SEE
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time and packaged properly. The glasses were exactly as descripted. They function as expected. When I require more, I will reorder. Great job and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have been putting them through everything and slowly wearing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Kenninghouse

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality, low priced and I am using them now so I can see! I have them all over the house and car...at this price I can offer to do it.
customer_reviews.author: VickiB

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like!
customer_reviews.text: Everything went well, as ordered, prompt service, prompt shipping, as advertised product. What's not to like!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased these several times! My husband and I both use them and they seem to disappear quickly!
customer_reviews.author: BrendaN

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wish there came in fifer rent bolder colors but they did say on the ad they were varying colors. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dm

customer_reviews.title: Always there for you
customer_reviews.text: Very nice readers. I really like the case they come in. Keep them handy, and don't have to worry about breaking them.
customer_reviews.author: mark h

customer_reviews.title: they fit nicely in my pocket
customer_reviews.text: i've been looking for these for some time and they are just what i wanted, they fit nicely in my pocket, they are well made, i will buy them again, thank you very much, Billie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more lost glasses
customer_reviews.text: After looking at a number of options I decided on this company due to quality of the product and the fact that they are supplied with a hard case. Delivered well before due date.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkshire Tyke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tiny tube glasses for a friend and he is very happy with the size and quality. I was pleased that they arrived in a timely manner and at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Readers are affordable and good quality! I love to have a pair in every room of my house. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Hall

customer_reviews.title: high quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased before. They last until lost. They do not break, if you use the protective tube. You can afford to lose a pair occasionally!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: lenses fell out
customer_reviews.text: Opened the tube on 2 of the glasses and one of the lens fell out immediately. Like the look, but the quality is very questionable........
customer_reviews.author: John H Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Like these readers and the case is hard so they don't get smashed in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as described. Prompt delivery as promised. I am perfectly happy with everyone but Amazon. That is because I think a five star rating for a merchant should be sufficient and I shouldn't have to elaborate. What's with the ratings???? Isn't a happy customer enough?
customer_reviews.author: Quilt Crazy

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Readers!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can put my glasses in the relatively small tube and then in my pocket without bending them up. These glasses seem to be great quality for the price and spring hinge keeps them on my face when bending over to work on something. The nose rest is also more comfortable than others that I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: D Davis

customer_reviews.title: Loved the compact glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, compact cases. Very easy to slip in a pocket and go. I really liked the colors and convenience. Nancy
customer_reviews.author: nancy heath

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these several times. Excellent optical quality. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome readers!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of readers in a tube and lost them. I found these and ordered them and absolutely LOVE them!! They fit great and the hard tube case fits perfect in any of my purses! They are better than any of my larger framed readers. I would totally recommend these readers!
customer_reviews.author: nick palmer

customer_reviews.title: Fun glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses! A fun way to carry around these readers in my purse in a compact way.
customer_reviews.author: Hanks mom

customer_reviews.title: was delivered immediately and they are beautiful. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, was delivered immediately and they are beautiful. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses post cataract surgery. Easy to carry and see through for close up objects.
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Smart and useful
customer_reviews.text: The reading glasses are very well made and have a trendy look. The colors were a good choice. Love the metal cases they came in. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Nedwick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are the best fitting reading glasses that I have found. Also like the variety of colours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanks great glasses received then right away. Will order again
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Prices for these types of readers are all over the place and most are high. These were resonably priced and were delivered right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best readers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these many years ago and liked them very much. For years I was looking for these to buy again and finally found them on Amazon. Glad I found them and the vendor quickly delivered them to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hintz

customer_reviews.title: and work fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: the glasses were as expected, and work fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Hahl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are well-made, and the case is strong and does a great job protecting the glasses in my black-hole purse. Note that the color of the glasses' frame matches the color of the case.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: The frame construction is very good.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic nose clips are poorly made and fall off. I have had Fiore's in the past and this did not happen. The frame construction is very good.
customer_reviews.author: mike trager

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are exceptional glasses for the money. If you don't need prescription readers, these are the ones to buy. My only complaint is that you can't choose your colors.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Ciolino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, i had been looking for these lenses 225 for a long time. they were hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Tonio Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Third time ordering from this site. Both the product, and the on time shipping, first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Russell W. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. They are lightweight, fit well, attractive. I've already ordered two sets and will soon order a third. Delivery was quick. Hope these will never be discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality ---Exactly what I needed. Shipping was very fast Pastor Bill
customer_reviews.author: pastor

customer_reviews.title: Good value. I like the streamlined case for use ...
customer_reviews.text: Good value. I like the streamlined case for use in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color coded for style and size. protected from scratches with metal case
customer_reviews.text: I love them. The metal case makes it impossible to scratch which is ideal for purses. The small size is all you need for scanning articles.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and service, exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Dion C.

customer_reviews.title: The frames are not black
customer_reviews.text: This picture of this product shows black frames, the frames are not black but the same color as the case and are off the chart ugly. Who the hell would were neon blue or pink frames. The picture is a total misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.author: WilJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Just what I wanted. They are lightweight, slip easily but snugly into the tube, and look nice on. Well worth it at the modest price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn King

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these readers! Especially like the individual hard cases for each pair! Would definitely order from Newport Blvd again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Trigg

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great seller service
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were exactly as expected and work well for the purpose intended. The seller did an outstanding job getting them to me promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lewis
